body: @torjak isn't that the same as saying people who like ntr are old, fat and disgusting? It's obvious that it's a fetish that just grosses some people out. Think of ntr like a foot fetish. Some people,e find it disgusting, and others find it to be a requirement. When it comes down to it, all of us need to shut the fuck up and just read the stupid Japanese porn that suits us instead of complaining like assholes.  Even I have complained about the same shit, and now realize that it just doesn't matter. I wish nhentai didn't have a comment section. Half of it is just people saying "extra thicc", and the other half is people complaining.

If you hate netorare then it is because you have the qualities of a cuck, so you cannot help but picture yourself in such situation otherwise you won't have a problem with the genre. Your hatred for NtR is a subtle admittance of being a cuck. Kys
Iexpectedbetter I see you on all the godless cuck shit lol
